li.label: Pre-industrial
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has grown in a pre-industrial society, {PAWN_pronoun} won't be able to handle complex machinery.

li.label: Industrial
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has grown in an industrial society. {PAWN_pronoun} is capable of using many technologies and work with machinery, but not the more advanced kind required for space flight.

li.label: Spacer
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has grown in a technologically advanced society, {PAWN_pronoun} would be familiar with pretty much any technology found on a rimworld.

li.label: Transcendent
li.description: The past of {PAWN_nameDef} is shrouded in mystery, {PAWN_pronoun} appears to have understanding of nature that goes beyond even the most advanced glitterworlds.
